description: Najica and Lila are assigned to investigate the 4 C`zNs is a pop quartet sensation that has exploded from nowhere to the top of the charts. But despite their outwardly normal appearance, rumor has it that one of the four C`zNs girls is actually a Humaritt. It is up to Najica and Lila to get close enough to discover which one it is.

titles.title: Falsche Stars und eine verlockende Falle
Itsuwari no Star wa Amai Wana no Kaori to Tomo ni
La star factice au doux parfum de piège
The Fictitious Star with a Sweet Trap-like Perfume
偽りの星(スター)は甘い罠の香りと共に
